changelog:
• Linux 4.9.315
• Add support pine
• Enable power efficient workqueues
• EXT4 optimizations
• Optimized Console FrameBuffer for upto 70% increase in Performance
• Correct mem_dump size
• Update srandom to 1.40
• fix fence timeout for 2 buff cases
• Enable ZSTD
• Upgrade to latest upstream zstd version 1.5.2
• Update RT priority
• Support Power Efficient Workqueues
• More others....

• Boot with all 8 cores
• Suppress verbose output during boot
• Add more goodies to PEWQ's
• Schedule workers on CPU0 or 0-5 by default
• Disable hw_random,enable srandom
• Enable HL/TTL target support
• Calculate battery more linearly
• Hardcode disksize to 2GB
• Introduce kernelspace battery saver mode
• Added underclock CPU for olive devices
• More others....
commit: Test underclock CPU. Supports all group devices OLIVES
